messages.speech: According to the Center for Disease Control and Prevention, if hand sanitizers are not available, wash your hands with soap and water, which is an even better alternative. Liquor is not effective against coronavirus. For an alcohol-based hand rub to be effective, it must have an alcohol content of at least 60%.
